data.text: @TJR2206 @albericie @abcnews @RadioNational Do men have a merit requirement? Hardly given the calibre of buffoons in the Liberal Party.
@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational If the Liberal Party had to pre-select good men most of the front bench would be ineligible… and most of the back bench for that matter.
@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational Was that "start" preselecting good men?
@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational Actually he hears it all the time! They’re called polls! FFS how out of touch are these #LNP imbeciles? https://t.co/Pq98yTZ3Ag
@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational I really appreciated your interview yesterday. Keep up the great work!
@albericie @FryGerard @abcnews @RadioNational yep they should definitely lift their game in both directions LOL

@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational Its obvious that the liberals don’t get that good women & good men should be evenly distributed in the population. It’s just statistically obvious...unless your social sphere is conceived inside a bubble of patriarchal superiority....all male private schools? Nah!! Never happens!
@elwhyte88 @albericie @abcnews @RadioNational You're making too much sense. It'll never catch on.
@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational No words...
@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational Ah, so that explains why they have so many useless men
@alicekryan @albericie @abcnews @RadioNational Always a whine in identity politics. Constant whine
@albericie @BellaFlokarti @abcnews @RadioNational I agree with Kroger. The Liberals dont preselected good men.😊
@sandybaydreamin @albericie @abcnews @RadioNational The left does not hate merit. Simply want to see it equally applied.
@albericie @myfibonacci Too easy to get into politics a compulsory diploma at very least should be required.
@albericie @ThePlumpkin  because they the party of inclusion and diversity... apparently
@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational Love ur work Emma
@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational Therein lies the problem. There are very few good men in parliament. Why would you do it?
@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational Poor choice of interviewee.
@elwhyte88 @kooliefarm @albericie @abcnews @RadioNational Truer words were never spoken! 😁
@albericie @TJR2206 @abcnews @RadioNational There is no emoji that adequately covers this feeling, @albericie
@elwhyte88 @albericie @abcnews @RadioNational I think if they preselect more women the men would have to up their standard to equal them tbh

@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational #LNP tend to select bad men (not just ordinary, or mediocre). Not all of them are bad, but it's largely a sad collection of #RWNJ's and #CrassBores. Let me think...  ...Warren Entsch? ...Trent Zimmerman? ...Karen Andrews? ...Anne Aly? Oh wait...
@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational Any person who thinks this- fundamentally has no idea / education of the issue. OR wants to ignore education about the issue.

@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational I genuinely consider Michael #Kroger a ‘Nowhere Man’. Achieved nothing. Does nothing. Full of misguided self importance.
#auspol
@LordofWentworth @albericie @abcnews @RadioNational Is that testosterone? I thought it was merit! 🤓
@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational someone better tell him that no one has considered they were using 'good' as a preselection criteria for the past 20 years

@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational Great interview- is it just me or did he agree that LP will bring in quotas (though naturally not calling it that)? Has changed his tune since the first interview after Julia Banks’ resignation.

@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational True, we never do. Yes, as applied here the measure is subjective and very rubbery at that. There is no reason the measure couldn’t be objective but it would gravely upset the old boys club.

@TJR2206 @albericie @abcnews @RadioNational Double 🙄🙄. Reality is there’s far more women of merit available, who don’t get promoted due to the “boys network” that exists in politics, high level companies, legal/accounting/financial services industry, etc. men don’t need to be appointed by merit, we already get appointed
@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational Merit cuts across sexes (& classes), which is why the Left hate it. It's kills identity politics.
@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational Tony Abbott is a good man..good for fuck all.
@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational Politics is the only example you need to completely disprove the merit argument. So many mediocre men promoted above their ability. So much entitlement.

@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational You didn't go in hard enough Emma. After his statement regarding bullying "saying no-one was bullied and even if they were that's what happens in politics." I was hoping you would nail him.
@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational Being 'good' is a requirement for women, but so far does not seem on evidence to be one for male pollies so. Valid point perhaps.
@TJR2206 @abcnews @RadioNational 🙄
@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational To be fair, the Liberals rarely select men on merit. They test for testosterone primarily.
@albericie @abcnews @RadioNational So many good men in the Coalition.
